name: CTRL
overview:
CTRL is an end-to-end video production and distribution company. They produce shows about video gaming and distribute these globally via Cable & Satellite, Internet and Mobile.

Distribution partners include cable & satellite operators, IP TV channels, social networks, and mobile portals. CTRL holds agreements with MySpace, Joost, Babelgum, Vuze, Metacafe, Blinkx, Bebo, Veoh, BT Vision, and many others.

CTRL formats are adjusted to the distribution channel, and range from 24-minute shows on our CTRL linear TV channel to 4-minute clips on mobile platforms.

Content partners include major game development companies, eSports competitions and videogame conventions. CTRL holds agreements with many parties, including Nintendo, Ubisoft, Electronic Arts and SEGA.

CTRL shows are daily viewed by millions of consumers, most male between 16-30 years.
